rules_text:
When Certhina War Captain enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Retreat 4 {5}{W} [i](Exile this permanent face-down. Distribute up to four +1/+1 counters among up to four target creatures you control.)[/i]
Whenever Certhina War Captain retreats, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
